英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standards for Tourist Hotel and Ordinary Hotel Rating Assessment by the Tourism Bureau, Ministry of Transportation and Communications
中文法規名稱: 交通部觀光局辦理觀光旅館及旅館等級評鑑收費標準
沿革內容:
1.Promulgated by Order Guan-ye-zi No. 098300467 dated March 2, 2009.
2.Amendment promulgated by Order Guan-ye-zi No. 10130019151 dated August 3, 2012.
3.Amendment promulgated by Order Guan-su-zi No. 11106008651 dated June 23, 2022.

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are prescribed pursuant to the provisions of Article 10, Paragraph 1 of the Charges and Fees Act.

When the Tourism Bureau, Ministry of Transportation and Communications (“the Tourism Bureau”) conducts rating assessments of tourist hotels and ordinary hotels, it shall charge rating assessment fees for the items of assessment according to the following schedule:
1.One-star to three-stars rating assessment fees, NTD36,000 (thirty-six thousand New Taiwan dollars).
2.Four-stars and above rating assessment fees, NTD86,000 (eighty-six thousand New Taiwan dollars).
For the issuance of a tourist hotel or ordinary hotel rating assessment sign, the Tourism Bureau shall charge a fee of NTD3,000 (three thousand New Taiwan dollars).
The amended provisions of this Schedule shall take effect from July 1, 2022.
